group_1.textRight: Just one... But I bet it'll work!
She said we were welcome to bring our own@food.
We can bring snacks, sides, and New Year's@food of our own to the party!

group_1.textLeft: That way we'll lower the risk of having@to eat something Mitama made, right?

group_1.textRight: Yep!
That's no guarantee we can avoid it though.

group_1.textLeft: But maybe she managed to cook something@good this time...
Right, there's a chance her cooking might@have gotten better.

group_1.textRight: [chara:100501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Uh, guys...are you serious right now?!

group_1.textLeft: Come on, Felicia, let's all go.
We can even lend Mitama a hand with the@party!

group_1.textRight: Why do I gotta help her out?

group_1.textLeft: If you help make some food, then we'll have@even more tasty things to eat.
And that'll make the New Year's party even@more fun!
Don't you think so? Why don't you come with@us?

group_1.textRight: Ugh... No arguing with you, I guess.
I guess I'll tag along if ya need my help@that badly!
Hello.
Many happy returns for the new year, Mitama!
Yes, Happy New Year.
HNY to ya, Mitama!
Here we all are.
L-let's, um...have a really nice year@together!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:111700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]I hope you'll be kind to your Coordinator@this year♪

group_1.textRight: That kimono surprisingly suits you.
Here ya go, we brought you a little@something to share!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, goodness... Um...you brought all this?

group_1.textRight: Yes. New Year's dishes from me, Chinese@food from Tsuruno, plus snacks and sides.

group_1.textLeft: My, my... I'm delighted you brought so much,@but can I really have all of it?

group_1.textRight: Of course you can!
Yup, please do.

That way I don't gotta choke down any―@[chara:100501:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100501:effect_shake][chara:100501:mouthOpen_1][chara:100501:motion_400][chara:100501:cheek_1][chara:100501:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:100501:lipSynch_1]Ouch!
That's right!
We'd never let you worry about all the food@by yourself!
Y-yeah...right!
If there's anything we can help you with,@let us know.
Yes!
We wanna make sure your New Year's party@goes great!
Yeah...great!
Unghh!

group_1.textLeft: In that case... Can I ask for your help@straightening out a few odds and ends?

group_1.textRight: (Odds and ends?)
(Maybe there's still a few things left to@do for the party?)
Well, first, would you bring us up to speed@on your preparations?
